```{r}
library(gulf)
```

## [September RV dataset](http://dmapps/en/inventory/526/view/)


```{r SeptemberRV}
x <- rv$set
table(x$year, x$month)
```


## [Inshore surveys](http://dmapps/en/inventory/413/view/)
```{r inshore}
x <- read.card("inshore", card.type="set")
table(x$year, x$month)
```

## [January surveys](http://dmapps/en/inventory/502/view/)
```{r January}
x <- read.card("January", card.type="set")
table(x$year, x$gear)
gear.str(c(9,61))
```

## [Juvenile cod surveys](http://dmapps/en/inventory/501/view/)
```{r juvenile}
x <- read.card("juvenile", card.type="set")
table(x$year, x$month)
```

## [Seasonal surveys](http://dmapps/en/inventory/1485/view/)
```{r, seasonal}
x <- read.card("seasonal", card.type="set")
table(x$year, x$month)
```
